title: Amount of Soda Served
body: A quality control specialist for a restaurant chain takes a random sample of size $$12$$ to check the amount of soda served in the $$16$$ oz. serving size. The sample mean is $$13.30$$ with a sample standard deviation of $$1.55$$. Assume the underlying population is normally distributed.
lesson: 7.3 Estimating a Population Mean (using the Student t Distribution)
